about_the_game:
After the Great War ended, a lot of things had changed in the lands Lyare once knew...

Explore

Unveil what the region has to offer. Traverse in a massive open world, complete quests, solve mysteries and gather useful resources scattered all around the landscape. Prepare yourself and embark on an adventure like no other!

Fight

Windfall is a beautiful yet dangerous place. Utilize your arsenal to fight your way through open plains, dark caverns and to the top of high mountains. Lyare is skilled with a vast variety of weapons. Swords, bows and even polearms - with the right equipment, no enemy dares to stand in your way.

Collect & Gather

Every adventurer need supplies. Gather items and resources of varying rarities and properties by using the right tools. Venture out into the region and mine for ore, collect wood, loot enemies, or simply explore your surroundings. There is lots to be found and it's all yours to take.

Craft

The harsh times on the battlefield have made Lyare a very skilled craftswoman. If you got the necessary materials, you can craft and refine tools, weapons, armor and even create useful potions and cook delicious meals.

Trade

Even though the economy of Windfall is not in its best shape after the Great War, trading is still a profitable endeavor. Use your hard earned gold to stock up on supplies and gear. Maybe you are even able to make a profit...

name: Project Windfall

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual-core processor, 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050Ti 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated audio
  • Additional Notes: System requirements subject to change
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Quad-core processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2080 SUPER 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11-compatible device or higher, 16-bit
  • Additional Notes: System requirements subject to change

short_description: Project Windfall is an open-world, third-person, anime-styled, action RPG in which you follow the story of Lyare Van Windfall - a charismatic, adventurous noble's daughter and the sole heir of house Windfall.
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
